org.openscience.cdk.math
Class Quaternion

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.math.Quaternion

public class Quaternion
extends java.lang.Object

This class handles quaternions. Quaternion are 2*2 complex matrices.

Belongs to CDK module:
qm
